text: John Langford may refer to: *John Langford (engineer), president of Aurora Flight Sciences *John Langford (computer scientist), at Microsoft Research *John Langford (rugby union) (born 1968), Australian rugby union player *John Alfred Langford (1823–1903), English journalist, poet and antiquary ==See also== *Jon Langford (born 1957), musician and artist *John Langford-Holt (1916–1993), British politician
title: John Langford
